All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddedNewChart
A chart component that displays the number of new cards added per day over a specified range.
AlertMessageUtil
Utility class for displaying alert dialogs in the application.
AlgorithmHiperparameter
Custom annotation used to mark fields as algorithm hyperparameters.
AllowedValues
Annotation to specify the allowed values for a field.
AppearanceTimeRevisionChart
A chart component that displays the distribution of cards by their next revision date over a specified range of days for a specific revision strategy.
AppLocaleSetting
Represents the locale settings for the application, including language and country information.
AppLocaleSettingRepository
Repository interface for managing AppLocaleSetting entities.
AppUser
Represents a user of the application.
AppUserRepository
Repository interface for managing AppUser entities.
AppUserService
Service class for managing users and authentication operations.
AuthorsFXMLController
Controller for the view displaying author and year information.
CardBase
Represents the base class for a card in a revision system.
CardBaseRepository
Repository interface for managing CardBase entities.
CardBaseRevision
Represents a record of a card revision event.
CardBaseRevisionRepository
Repository interface for managing CardBaseRevision entities.
CardCell
Custom cell for displaying `CardBase` objects within a ListView.
CardCellFXMLController
A controller for managing the display and actions of a card within a deck, providing options to edit or delete the card.
CardConstantCoefficient
Represents a card that uses constant coefficients for calculating revision times.
CardRevisionService
Service class responsible for handling the revision of cards.
CardService
Service class for managing CardBase entities and related operations.
CardSuperMemo2
Represents a card that uses the SuperMemo2 algorithm for spaced repetition.
ChartEntry
Represents an entry for a statistical chart along with an associated revision strategy index.
ChartService
Service class responsible for managing chart generation and translation of available ranges and chart types.
ConstantCoefficientRevisionAlgorithm
A revision algorithm based on the Constant Coefficients method for spaced repetition.
CsvUtil
Utility class for handling CSV file operations for a list of CardBase objects.
DeckBase
Represents a deck of cards used in a spaced repetition system.
DeckBaseRepository
Repository interface for managing DeckBase entities.
DeckBaseStatistics
Represents statistical data related to the usage and performance of a deck in a spaced repetition system.
DeckBaseStatisticsRepository
Repository interface for managing DeckBaseStatistics entities.
DeckCell
Custom cell for displaying `DeckBase` objects within a ListView.
DeckCellFXMLController
A controller class for managing the display and interactions of a single deck within the user interface.
DeckService
Service class responsible for managing decks and cards.
DecksFXMLController
Controller for the main view displaying all decks associated with a user.
DeckStatisticsService
Service class responsible for managing deck statistics.
FieldValueValidator
Utility class for validating field values against annotations like NotNull, NotEmpty, Min, Max, and AllowedValues.
FXMLController
The `FXMLController` class serves as an abstract base class for all FXML controllers in the application.
FXMLFileLoader
Utility class for loading FXML files in the application.
ImageUtil
Utility class for creating icons.
InterfaceFinder
Utility class for finding classes or interfaces in a package that implement or extend a specific base class or interface.
LanguageSelectionFXMLController
Controller for selecting the application's language.
LoginFXMLController
Controller for the login view, handling user authentication and registration.
Main
Main class of the application.
MainStage
Main application stage that manages the display of views and the application menu.
MainStageScenes
Enum representing different JavaFX scenes in the main application stage.
Max
Annotation to specify the maximum allowed value for a numeric field.
MenuBarFXMLController
The `MenuBarFXMLController` class manages the menu bar of the application, providing options for navigating between views and managing language and session settings.
MenuDeckFXMLController
The `MenuDeckFXMLController` class represents a menu for deck-related actions, including adding cards, browsing the deck, revising cards, viewing settings, viewing statistics, and closing the menu.
MessageConfig
Configuration class for message resources.
Min
Annotation to specify the minimum allowed value for a numeric field.
NewDeckFXMLController
Controller for the New Deck view, allowing users to create a new deck or import cards from a file.
NotEmpty
Annotation to specify that a field cannot be empty.
NotNull
Annotation to specify that a field cannot be null.
NumberTextField
A custom TextField that allows only positive integers to be entered.
RegularTextModeRevisionStrategy<T>
Represents the regular text mode revision strategy.
ReverseTextModeRevisionStrategy<T>
Represents the reverse text mode revision strategy.
RevisedForTheFirstTimeChart
A chart component that displays the number of cards revised for the first time over a specified range of days.
RevisionAddCardFXMLController
A controller class for managing the addition of new cards to a deck, either manually or by importing from a file.
RevisionAlgorithm<T>
Abstract class representing a revision algorithm for cards.
RevisionAlgorithmRepository
Repository interface for managing RevisionAlgorithm entities.
RevisionAlgorithmService
Service responsible for managing revision algorithms, including loading them dynamically from the classpath and creating instances.
RevisionChart
A chart component that visualizes the number of cards revised over time for a specific revision strategy.
RevisionCounts
Represents the revision counts for a specific revision strategy associated with a deck's statistics.
RevisionCountsRepository
Repository interface for managing RevisionCounts entities.
RevisionEditCardFXMLController
Controller class for editing existing cards within a deck.
RevisionFXMLController
Controller class for managing the card revision view in the application.
RevisionRegularFXMLController
Controller class for managing the regular revision of cards in a deck.
RevisionReverseFXMLController
Controller for managing the reverse revision of cards in a deck.
RevisionSearchFXMLController
Controller class for searching cards within a deck.
RevisionSettingsFXMLController
Controller for managing the settings of a deck's revision algorithm.
RevisionStatisticsFXMLController
Controller for displaying revision statistics of a deck in chart form.
RevisionStrategy<T>
Represents an abstract revision strategy for handling card revisions in a spaced repetition system.
SpringContext
Utility class for accessing Spring's application context.
StatisticsChart
An abstract class representing a statistics chart for decks.
StringUtil
Utility class for common string manipulation operations.
SuperMemo2RevisionAlgorithm
A revision algorithm based on the SuperMemo2 method for spaced repetition.
TranslationService
Service responsible for handling translations and managing locale settings.
TrashDeckCell
Custom `ListCell` for displaying `DeckBase` items in the trash view.
TrashDeckCellFXMLController
A controller class for managing the display and interactions of a single deck in the trash view.
TrashFXMLController
Controller for the Trash view, providing options to manage deleted decks.
